entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023
